Package org.eclipse.emailrecommender

Class Summary
Activator The activator class controls the plug-in life cycle
Mail Data class implementing the data structure of a single email.
MailContentView Implements the view showing the content of selected email.
MailTableLabelProvider Class providing matching from the Mail objects given by the database search to the text actually shown in the columns of the MailView
MailView Implementation of the view with the results of the email search.
PostgreSearch Implementation of the lightweight search methods using POSTGRESQL
Search Main class to implement search.
